text: Okay guys, so I'm pretty excited about today.

Once we had eaten lunch, it was finally time

especially when you're dressed in Renaissance

We paraded around like kings and queens, and
then explored the former home of Bartolomeo

Colleoni, who was captain-general of the Republic

battling neighbouring city-states.
We're Kings and Queens from around the world.

Winter is coming.

So I had a lot of fun cooking, eating and
